1557360.name: ITERRIA ZONE
1557360.description:
ITERRIA ZONE - Horde destroying game
Storyline:
2019 The world plummets into an epidemic of a new virus
IT-corporation ITERRIA announces the creation of a vaccine against the virus
2020 The media controlled by the ITERRIA corporation creates a worldwide panic
2021 Compulsory vaccination of the population with a vaccine created by the ITERRIA corporation begins (ITERRIA corporation started compulsory vaccination of the population)
Army and scientists are excluded from vaccination
2024 The first signs of a strange mutation and behavior of the vaccinated population begin
The world is descending into chaos.
2025 Now 85% the population of the planet is aggressive creatures little have resemblance to human
You're a soldier, you weren't vaccinated!!!

About the project:
ITERRIA ZONE game with dynamic gameplay. You have to fight the hordes, of the humanoid creatures they were the result of a inaccuracy in the genetic code of a vaccine that was applied to humans.. The main objective of the game is complete tasks, destroy hordes, and survive among the apocalypse :)

Basic mechanics:
Dynamic gameplay
Horde of enemies
Special Enemies
Survival
Stealth mode
Protection base and allies
Search for items
Allied AI
Lot of shooting :)

Important Disclaimer:
As I'm making this game alone as an independent developer and with limited budget, I don't have any deadlines or limitations making ITERRIA ZONE. Game will be depending on the community to give me feedback about what's interesting and what's not, and thank you in advance for giving me a shot!
However, I gonna say, I really enjoy destroying of hordes of enemies and I've noticed that there are not many such kind of games.
I've started creating this project as an experiment, and I also have learned a lot as the game grows. I am glad that now i can share it with you. It will help to develop it faster.
